Alan Ramaley, CTO

Alan Ramaley is responsible for the functional design of all of thePlatform’s product offerings. Prior to co-founding thePlatform, he was a program manager at Microsoft for seven years, where he worked on Microsoft Project, Microsoft Team Manager, and Microsoft Office. He holds nine patents and has one patent pending in the areas of digital media management, workflow, and content publishing. Alan has a Bachelor’s degree in Symbolic Systems and a Masters in Computer Science, both from Stanford University.
